## `SetHistogramBarOpacity`

Sets bar opacity (in histograms).

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetHistogramBarOpacity(number opacity)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` opacity | The opacity level (should be between 0--255) |
:::
